attributes.action: Introduce a phased program of Fuel Duty Cuts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For every £1 of fuel we pay for, around 70p goes straight to the Government in Fuel Duty. 

Motorists are already paying too much to use their cars, with congestion charging expanding and the recent rises in road tax.

I propose that the Government introduce a phased reduction of fuel duty via series of 2p reductions every 6 months, for a period of 5 years, thus bringing the rate of duty down to around the 50% mark.
